headline: DXC Ranked a Leader in ISG Provider Lens™ ServiceNow Ecosystem Partners 2025 Study
summary: DXC Technology (NYSE: DXC), a leading Fortune 500 global technology services provider, was recognized by ISG, a leading global technology research and advisory firm, in its Provider Lens™ ServiceNow Ecosystem Partners 2025 study as a leader across all categories in the US, AP&J, and Europe. The recognition underscores DXC's position as an Elite ServiceNow Ecosystem Partner and highlights its proven ability to deliver measurable ROI, leverage deep industry expertise, and invest in continuous skil
